domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump You watch way too much TV.  You play too much golf.

Maybe that is why covid-19 has killed 123,000 Americans and made almost 3 million sick.   That is over 1% of the population.  And in the last 2 months,  you have done nothing but watch TV and play golf.
